MemberSignature.Value: public void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship (string targetForestName, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection direction, string trustPassword);

.method public hidebysig instance void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship(string targetForestName, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection direction, string trustPassword) cil managed
Public Sub CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship (targetForestName As String, direction As TrustDirection, trustPassword As String)
public: void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship(System::String ^ targetForestName, System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectory::TrustDirection direction, System::String ^ trustPassword);

param.name: targetForestName
param.span: The DNS name of the forest that the trust is created with.

span.span: The DNS name of the forest that the trust is created with.

param.name: direction
param.span: One of the members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this forest.

span.span: One of the members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this forest.

param.name: trustPassword
param.span: The password for the trust.

span.span: The password for the trust.

summary.span: Creates the local side of a trust relationship with the specified forest.

span.span: Creates the local side of a trust relationship with the specified forest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Questo metodo crea un lato di una relazione di trust.This method creates one side of a trust relationship. La relazione di trust non viene stabilita fino a quando non sono stati creati entrambi i lati della relazione di trust.The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created. Il `trustPassword` parametro associa una password di trust creato.The `trustPassword` parameter associates a password with the created trust. Quando viene creato l'altro lato della relazione di trust, viene fornita la stessa password e le due relazioni di trust locale vengono quindi associati tra loro.When the other side of the trust is created, the same password is provided and the two local trusts are then bound to each other. Per creare a livello di codice entrambi i lati di una relazione di trust in una singola chiamata al metodo, utilizzare il metodo.To programmatically create both sides of a trust relationship in a single method call, use the method.

span.span: The trust relationship already exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Questo metodo crea entrambi i lati di una relazione di trust con una singola chiamata al metodo.This method creates both sides of a trust relationship with a single method call. Il metodo viene utilizzato per creare un solo lato di una relazione di trust.The method is used to create only one side of a trust.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Quando viene eliminato un lato di una relazione di trust, non viene stabilito il trust.When one side of a trust relationship is deleted, the trust is no longer established. remarks.format: ## Remarks È possibile trovare i controller di dominio individuabili eseguendo una query di record SRV in DNS.You can find discoverable domain controllers by querying DNS SRV records. Da questo metodo vengono restituiti solo i cataloghi globali che registrano un generico, non specifici per sito, i record SRV GC.Only global catalogs that register a generic, non-site-specific, GC SRV record are returned by this method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection FindAllDiscoverableGlobalCatalogs(string siteName) cil managed
Public Function FindAllDiscoverableGlobalCatalogs (siteName As String) As GlobalCatalogCollection

param.name: siteName
param.span: The name of the site to search.

span.span: The name of the site to search.

summary.span: Finds all of the discoverable global catalogs in this forest in a specified site.

span.span: Finds all of the discoverable global catalogs in this forest in a specified site.

returns.span: A that contains the collection of global catalogs that were found.

span.span: A that contains the collection of global catalogs that were found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks È possibile trovare cataloghi globali individuabili eseguendo una query di record SRV in DNS.You can find discoverable global catalogs by querying DNS SRV records. Se un catalogo globale non consente di registrare un record SRV Garbage Collection per il sito specificato, non viene restituito da questo metodo, anche se il catalogo globale è situato fisicamente all'interno di tale sito.If a global catalog does not register a GC SRV record for the specified site, it will not be returned by this method, even if the global catalog is physically located within that site. Verranno restituiti tutti i cataloghi globali che registrano un record SRV Garbage Collection per il sito specificato da questo metodo, anche se potrebbero non essere collocati fisicamente all'interno di tale sito.All global catalogs which register a GC SRV record for the specified site will be returned by this method, even if they might not be physically located within that site.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool GetSelectiveAuthenticationStatus(string targetForestName) cil managed
Public Function GetSelectiveAuthenticationStatus (targetForestName As String) As Boolean

param.name: targetForestName
param.span: The DNS name of the with which the inbound trust relationship exists.

span.span: The DNS name of the with which the inbound trust relationship exists.

summary.span: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether selective authentication is enabled on the inbound trust relationship with the specified forest.

span.span: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether selective authentication is enabled on the inbound trust relationship with the specified forest.

summary.span: if selective authentication is enabled; otherwise, .

span.span: if selective authentication is enabled; otherwise, .

returns.span: if selective authentication is enabled; otherwise, .

span.span: if selective authentication is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Per un trust tra foreste, se si seleziona l'autenticazione selettiva, le autorizzazioni devono essere abilitate manualmente in ogni dominio e risorsa nella foresta locale a cui si desidera abbiano accesso gli utenti in altra foresta.For a forest trust, if you opt for selective authentication, permissions must be manually enabled on each domain and resource in the local forest to which you want users in the other forest to have access. Quando un utente viene autenticato mediante una relazione di trust per il quale selettiva è abilitata l'autenticazione, un'altra organizzazione ID di sicurezza (SID) viene aggiunto ai dati di autorizzazione dell'utente.When a user authenticates across a trust for which selective authentication is enabled, an Other Organization security ID (SID) is added to the user's authorization data. La presenza di questo SID determina un controllo nel dominio della risorsa allo scopo di verificare che all'utente sia consentita l'autenticazione per il servizio specifico.The presence of this SID prompts a check on the resource domain to ensure that the user is allowed to authenticate to the particular service. Dopo che l'utente viene autenticato, il server che autentica l'utente aggiunge il SID di organizzazione questo se i SID altra organizzazione non è già presente.After the user is authenticated, the server that authenticates the user adds the This Organization SID if the Other Organization SID is not already present. Nel contesto dell'utente autenticato possono essere presenti solo questi SID speciali.Only one of these special SIDs can be present in an authenticated user's context.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RaiseForestFunctionality(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestMode forestMode) cil managed

param.name: forestMode
param.span: A enumeration value that specifies the new operation level for the forest.

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies the new operation level for the forest.

summary.span: Raises the mode of operation for the forest.

span.span: Raises the mode of operation for the forest.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Il valore può essere generato ma non ridotto.The value can be raised but not lowered. Ciò significa che l'aumento del livello di funzionalità della foresta non può essere annullato e la decisione di eseguire questa operazione deve essere apportata con attenzione.This means that raising the functionality level of the forest is not reversible and the decision to do this should be made carefully. Per ulteriori informazioni sulle modalità operative di foresta, vedere [funzionalità del dominio e foresta](http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/WindowsServ/2003/standard/proddocs/en-us/sag_levels.asp).For more information about forest operational modes, see [Domain and forest functionality](http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/WindowsServ/2003/standard/proddocs/en-us/sag_levels.asp). Nella tabella seguente definisce i valori validi per `forestMode` in base alla modalità operativa corrente della foresta.The following table defines the valid values for `forestMode` based on the current operating mode of the forest. |Modalità correnteCurrent mode|Modalità può essere generata perMode can be raised to| |------------------|---------------------------| ||

| ||| ||nessunoNone|

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetSidFilteringStatus (string targetForestName, bool enable);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetSidFilteringStatus(string targetForestName, bool enable) cil managed
Public Sub SetSidFilteringStatus (targetForestName As String, enable As Boolean)
public: void SetSidFilteringStatus(System::String ^ targetForestName, bool enable);

param.name: targetForestName
param.span: The DNS name of the object with which the trust relationship exists.

span.span: The DNS name of the object with which the trust relationship exists.

param.name: enable
param.span: if SID filtering is to be enabled; otherwise, .

span.span: if SID filtering is to be enabled; otherwise, .

summary.span: Sets the SID filtering state with the specified forest.

span.span: Sets the SID filtering state with the specified forest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Per impostazione predefinita, nuovi ed esterni foresta trust in [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)] servizi di dominio Active Directory impongono il filtro SID.By default, new external and forest trusts in [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)] Active Directory Domain Services enforce SID filtering. Il filtro SID viene utilizzato per prevenire gli attacchi da utenti malintenzionati che potrebbero tentare di concedere diritti utente elevati per un altro account utente.SID filtering is used to prevent attacks from malicious users who might try to grant elevated user rights to another user account. Applicare il filtro SID su trust tra foreste non impedisce le migrazioni a domini all'interno della stessa foresta di utilizzare la cronologia SID e non influiscono sulla strategia di controllo dell'accesso di gruppo universale.Enforcing SID filtering on forest trusts does not prevent migrations to domains within the same forest from using SID history and will not affect your universal group access control strategy.

Public Sub VerifyTrustRelationship (targetForest As Forest, direction As TrustDirection)

param.name: targetForest
param.span: A object for which to verify the trust relationship.

span.span: A object for which to verify the trust relationship.

param.name: direction
param.span: A value that specifies the direction of the trust, relative to this forest.

summary.span: Verifies that a previously established trust with the specified forest is valid.

span.span: Verifies that a previously established trust with the specified forest is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Questo metodo verifica che una relazione di trust è stata stabilita completamente.This method verifies that a trust relationship has been fully established. La relazione di trust non viene stabilita fino a quando non sono stati creati entrambi i lati della relazione di trust.The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created.
